net.hockeyapp.android

Class FeedbackManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hockeyapp.android.FeedbackManager

  • public class FeedbackManager
extends java.lang.Object

    Description

    The FeedbackManager displays the feedback currentActivity.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static void register(android.content.Context context)
        Registers new Feedback manager. HockeyApp App Identifier is read from configuration values in AndroidManifest.xml
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use. Usually your Activity object.

      • register

        public static void register(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String appIdentifier)
        Registers new Feedback manager.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use. Usually your Activity object.
        appIdentifier - App ID of your app on HockeyApp.

      • register

        public static void register(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String appIdentifier,
                            FeedbackManagerListener listener)
        Registers new Feedback manager.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use. Usually your Activity object.
        appIdentifier - App ID of your app on HockeyApp.
        listener - Implement for callback functions.

      • register

        public static void register(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String urlString,
                            java.lang.String appIdentifier,
                            FeedbackManagerListener listener)
        Registers new Feedback manager.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use. Usually your Activity object.
        urlString - URL of the HockeyApp server.
        appIdentifier - App ID of your app on HockeyApp.
        listener - Implement for callback functions.

      • unregister

        public static void unregister()
        Unregisters the update manager

                                        android.net.Uri... attachments)
        Starts the FeedbackActivity
        Parameters:
        context - Context object
        attachments - the optional attachment Uris

      • showFeedbackActivity

        public static void showFeedbackActivity(android.content.Context context,
                                        android.os.Bundle extras,
                                        android.net.Uri... attachments)
        Starts the FeedbackActivity
        Parameters:
        context - Context object
        attachments - the optional attachment Uris
        extras - a bundle to be added to the Intent that starts the FeedbackActivity instance

      • checkForAnswersAndNotify

        public static void checkForAnswersAndNotify(android.content.Context context)
        Checks if an answer to the feedback is available and if yes notifies the listener or creates a system notification.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use

      • getLastListener

        public static FeedbackManagerListener getLastListener()
        Returns the last listener which has been registered with any Feedback manager.
        Returns:
        last used feedback listener

        Parameters:

      • setActivityForScreenshot

        public static void setActivityForScreenshot(android.app.Activity activity)
        Stores a reference to the given activity to be used for taking a screenshot of it. Reference is cleared only when method unsetCurrentActivityForScreenshot is called.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity object

      • unsetCurrentActivityForScreenshot

        public static void unsetCurrentActivityForScreenshot(android.app.Activity activity)
        Clears the reference to the activity that was set before by setActivityForScreenshot.
        Parameters:
        activity - activity for screenshot

      • takeScreenshot

        public static void takeScreenshot(android.content.Context context)
        Takes a screenshot of the currently set activity and stores it in the HockeyApp folder on the external storage also publishing it to the Android gallery.
        Parameters:
        context - toast messages will be displayed using this context
